Blog.post: Chu Records I'll show you why they call me DaProfessa/ niggas get scared to battle, cuz they know not to test me/ I run up on em, straight killin a verse/ put a gun on em, and send em to the back of the universe/ rep for the 973, the only rapper truly blessed with a curse/ gotta drop rhymes heavily, like if my flow was to burst/ I got weaponry, from a tek to shotty/ and I'll never get ratted out, cuz I'm not trying to end up like Erv Gotti/ dying in jail, money aint a thing I come out on bail/ yall gotta recognize and stop bitin my raps/ cuz half the mc's who bite are whack/ niggas got problem? I'll fight em back/ I'm a big problem solver, big round revolver/ mess with me and I turn a battle into a slaughter/ better take cover/ DaProfessa, one and only, there aint no other/
Chu, Sittin in Newspaper waitin for free style friday tomorrow on Bet at 9pm shits gon be tizzight. You know postin my own free style on friday Holla at cho boy Preach

I woke up at 9:30 I was coo wit it,I said damn its kinda early but Im coo wit it, I had a message on my celly im like who did it, Turns out it was a chick I like to ohh wit it, Now im tryin to figure out if im gonna fool wit it, She use to be a cheerleader type school spirit, You know that bom bom back flip split wit it, I know a lotta nigga's tryied but they didn't get it, Or maybe they had the game but they just didn't spit it.
Zach is Hella crazy over Megan. Thats funny dat someone is callin them selfs Hey on people's websites and talking hella shit. Good thing they dont know bout my site.

Chu Preach Man Im hella bored. I hope that the gurls go to state. Cuz people get excuse from school to go to the game so that will be tight. Dat would be tight if I made my own record label. I would call it Chu Records Holla at cho Boy, Preach

Man its been awhile since I've Posted but anyways. Break was hella gay just chilled at home wit Big Phil and went to the basketball games. Just got done making another tape about Beatboxing wish I knew someone famous so I can be part of a record label. Shit would be Tizzight. Chu Preach and Holla at cho Boy
Well sitin at home chillin like a villin. Looking at other websites and notice that someone name "Hey" is talking shit bout Zach D. Thats hella gay
Well sittin in Newspaper. Thinking bout Haley dont know if im gonna ask her out or what. It would be hard for me to see her cuz she lives in Shnohomish (if thats how you spell it)
I know you fella's are felling the Tyra Banks picture. Thats my future wife. Naw I wish.
The Original king is back in the Game. Coming up wit a new CD droping in stores May 5 titled DaProfessa:Just got made. Naw just kidding but I made a demo tape if anyone wants to listen

Well ecitied (if that's how you spell it) cuz today's my last day at Monroe High School. This school is so fucking gay. Im switching to CCA a way better school then here. Only have to go to school for three hours hella tight. Chu Preach

Man im hella pissed off. Fucking Haley is mad at me cuz I told Eric what she said. So she doesn't want me to call her or anything. But yeah I got hella drunk on Saturday. It was tight then I saw Larry when I was walking home, he wanted me to get drunk with him when I already was. But man, I wish Haley wasn't mad at me. Cuz I don't know. Chu Preach

Well kinda mad that I didn't get to hang out with Haley today. I haven't seen here in hella long. Might see a movie wit her tommorrow though. Well it would be tight if I made a demo of me beatboxing then sent it to someone hella famous that would be hella tight. Be on T.V. and hella other shit. Chu Preach

Wut up Pimps and Females? Well thinkin bout changing my nickname from Da Professa to Da Scientist cuz dat sounds better and im not copying the And1 guy Da Professa. If anyone is asking why I call myself this. its because I im the Human Beatboxer of Monroe. Hella people think so and thats what I love to do. Can you dig it? Well waiting for tommorrow so i can chill wit Haley haven't talked to her in hella long. Thinkin bout changin the song again for like the 3rd or 4th time shit. Man yesterday was tight. Me and Woody were boxing all day. Then we played hit for hit all over our body besides our face. My sides are hurting hella. Sydney's mad at me and there's nothin I can do bout it. She wont even talk to me or Woody. That shits hella gay, she's like a little sister to me. Chu Preach, Signing out Da Scientist

Man, in Newspaper like always. Gotta go to counsiling after school really don't want to today. But I gots to do it for my parents. Well I don't know what else im suppose to say, oh yeah I might be changeing schools to something called CCA. Hopefully its better than Monroe High School. I hate this school so much. Its fucking drama. I can't wait for summer, going to New York with Woody and Stiffy, Find some hunnies out there, and throw some party's that would be hella tight. Chu Preach

I know everone is diggin the music on my site. Thinkin bout changing it though. Shit this weekend was tight. Me, Woody, Stiffy, and Josh went to go see Dawn of the Dead. That movie was fucking tight. It was more funny then scary then I thought. Can't wait for this friday might get drunk like a monkey with Walter. I think Sydney is pissed at me too though. I don't know but uhhhhhhhh. Chu Preach

Man Ashlyn is so fucking GAY. She wrote me this note yesterday sayin that I was shallow cuz i wouldn't go out with her friend. That's hella gay. Man she's the dumbest gurl I ever went out of. Damn gurls like that fucking piss me off. Chu Preach
Man meet some Gurls from Stanwood, it was tight one was fine and the other wasn't. Man dat would be cool if they went to our schools. Should of got her digits cuz you know. But yeah Chu Preach

Well Zach if yah read dis, Love is a Strong Word, to me love to me is, wanting to be with someone every second, Someone who you can stand to be around more than your friends. If you truly love someone then don't let them go away. Make them want them to stay with you, make sure they feel the same way you do. You smell me. But anywaz Hella pissed off, Cuz Halay was gonna chill wit me today, but I gots to do community service today, that shits hella gay, cuz I haven't hung wit Haley in a hella long time. Chu Preach

Chu St. Patrick's day. Hella people wearing green in school. Seeing a couple of females at our school today for some choir shit or something like that. Hayley's gonna come over tommorrow to chill. You know, I want to go out wit her hella bad but i don't think she knows that
Sittin in Advisory, found out bout some gurls i meet at the basketball game just turned 15. But anywaz tryin to figure out who dis d3b is. Probably know him/she is but spacing now. Chu Preach

Well skippin Newspaper today, chillin wit Cooper. Wut up Haley call me sometime since you wanna hang out. But anywaz went to two games last week. Shit was tight hella females. All kind of colors up in there. Chu Preach

Man dat game was dope yesterday. The one wit Franklin & Bethal. Put a bet dat Bethal was goin to win by five and they did. 55 to 60. Nurrell's bitch ass didn't pay me cuz i was kiddin around sayin that i wasn't goin to. I aint no bitch, but anywaz shit's goin to be tight tommorrow if i go to the game. Oh never mind gotta go to court. Free Style Friday tomorrow. Chu Preach

Shit since Zach and Seth's doin it I gots to do it SERIES ONE- YOU -- Name: Tyrus aka Wesley aka Tru Killa aka Youn Scrappa aka Da Professa -- Birth date: 5/24/88 -- Nationality: Black -- Location: Butt fuck Monroe -- Eye Color: Brown -- Hair Color: Black as the Night -- Righty or Lefty: Right is Tight -- Zodiac Sign: Chu Know the Gemini SERIES TWO- DESCRIBE -- Shoes you wore today: The Phat Wezzies -- Your hair: Gotta shave it. -- Your eyes: Shit tight as they always is -- Your weakness?: Talkin to the females -- Your fears: hate the heights -- Your perfect pizza: chu know sausage wit the cheese in the crust -- One thing you'd like to achieve: Durrty South Clothinline SERIES THREE- WHAT IZZZZZ.. -- Something other ppl wouldnâ€™t know about you: Love to Sing some R&B -- Your thoughts first waking up: Fuck another day of school -- The first feature you notice in the opposite sex: Lovin the theighs -- Your best physical feature: Shit the face is Baby Face -- Your bedtime: Shit whenever I fell like it -- Your greatest accomplishment: Shit beat boxing -- Your most missed memory: Shit I don't know SERIES FOUR- WHICH WOULD YOU PREFER? -- Pepsi or Coke: Moutain Dew Pepsi and Coke is for Square's -- McDonald's or Burger King: McDonald's of Coure -- Single or group dates: gotta go Single feel weird wit hella peeps -- Adidas or Nike: Gotta Represent Nike's for Zach -- Lipton or Nestea: Gotta drink the Nestea -- Chocolate or vanilla: Strawberry Man -- Cappuccino or coffee: Gotta drink the Cappuccino Coffee's gross -- Boxers or briefs: Boxer's hate when the nuts stick to yah legs SERIES FIVE- DO YOU -- Smoke: Naw don't wanna kill myself -- Sing well: Of course -- Take a shower everyday: Of course gotta smell good for the Females -- Have a crush: Not now got a gurl already -- Who are they: Ashlyn, had a thing for Haley but she didn't want me (tear) --Do you think you've been in love: Naw maybe a little -- Want to go to college: Yeah so I can make Durrty South Clothingline -- Like school: Hell no, but gotta get education -- Want to get married: Yeah, when im older to make little Trent -- Type with your fingers keys: Yeah -- Believe in yourself: Hell yeah gotta keep at it -- Get motion sickness: Naw don't even know what dat is! -- Think you're attractive: Females say im cute so sure! -- Think you're a health freak: Naw -- Get along with your parents: Hell no why yah think iv'e been in jail so many times -- Like thunderstorms: Naw can't sleep at night SERIES SIX- THE FUTURE -- Age you hope to be married: I'd say 25 when the clothingline comes out -- Numbers and Names of Children: 2. Trent and Sky -- Describe your Dream Wedding: Shit at my Concert -- How do you want to die: I don't wanna, but if I gotta gettin shot in the head. -- What do you want to be when you grow up: R&B singer and if that falls out a Counsoler -- What country would you most like to visit: Puerto Rico, Puerto Ricians are hella FINE SERIES SEVE- THE OPPOSITE SEX -- Best eye color?: Sky Blue -- Best hair color?: Brunette -- Short or long hair?:shoulder length -- Best height: 2 inches shorter then me -- Best weight: it don't matter as long as they aint bigger then me -- Best articles of clothing: Some tight jeans so I can see those Theighs and gotta show some cleveage -- Best date location: Chillin at a park in the dark just talkin bout things on a blanket with some Hipnotic -- Best kiss location: Shit some where Dark SERIES EIGHT- RANDOM -- Number of Girls I have kissed in my life: 7 or 8 -- Girls you have made out with: 4 -- Girlfriends you've had: 5 -- Boys you have kissed: Man i aint Gay -- Boyfriends you've had: Like I said befo I aint gay -- Drugs taken illegally: Some Weed, Hipnotic, Barcardi Gold, and Silver -- People I could trust with my life:4 -- CDs that I own: Hella Mixes! -- Piercing: 2 -- Tattoos: bout to get one, of The Martin Luther King speach on my left forearm -- Number of times my name has appeared in the newspaper?: 0 -- Scars on my body: countless

Sittin in Advisory wonderin where Zach is. Man dat nigga always skips dis class. Learning about Acadamy's next year. Dis shit is gonna be hella gay. Man someone is tellin my Girl dat im gonna brake up wit her and dat shit aint coo. So holla at cho boy Woody and stay out of trouble. Chu Preach

Sittin in Newspaper. Shit's goin tight wit me and Ashlyn. Megan is da Gayest bitch alive. Just like my hommie Woody said every one talks shit about her so the only way she can deal wit it is to hide the pain away in side. Shit saw fuckin Starsky and Hutch, Hidalgo, and Eurotrip yesterday. Dos movies was hella tight. To much dick in Eurotrip do. Erick don't be tryin to clame my clothin line hommie and holla at cho boy. Chu Preach
Shit sittin in the Library, Fuckin hella drama on peeps websites. Got damn going to a party today gonna get hella drunk hell yah. Haven't been to a party hella long Chu Preach

Shit sitten in Newspaper wonderin whats gonna happen to me. Cuz they said I was plagerism the articles I was writing. Dat's fucking Wack. But anywayz can't wait till I get my fucking phone back might get it tommorrow. Chu Preach
Shit sittin in the Library skippin Psycology. Shit's tight. Helped the homie Woody make his own blogger so he can do shit too.

Shit sittin in advisory wit Zach D got hella scared. Cuz the securtiy dude came up to me and ask about some stolen money. Man had a panic attack. But shit. Woke up in the morning had to thank god I don't know but today seems kinda hott.
Well sttin in Biology talkin to horn dogg over here. Man he's such a horn dogg, got damn. He even goes to gay websites. Man
Man my moms hella gay. Hopefully this week will be tight. You know doing big things in the city. Chu Preach. Don't forget Chu Records comin soon Fet.: Zach D D-Flow Mc Prophecy and DaProfessa

Man its been awhile since I've blog. Sittin at a neghibors house watching her kids. Its alright.Their son is hella funny. Man im feeling Haley hella bad but I dont know. Every thing is getting complicated. Chu Preach
Sittin in Class. Im feeling hella drowzy. I toke some alergy medicine that made me so ing tired, it sucks. Cuz I cant work on anything and im tryin to get my GED so i can finish this soon.

Sittin in the new school. you know im diggin everything and . Kickin it with Steven after school you know. Man im feeling Haley hella bad. But every time I tell her she think's im playin. Man I would do anything to be with her. But there's nothin I can do. Chu Preach
Saw HellBoy Friday, dat movie was tight. I saw it wit Woody. So much action and hella funny. But yeah got's to go do other things. Hope everyone is feeling the new song. Chu Preach
Shit, Hella nice day today. Dont have to go to school for 3 more days. Diggin da days off. Can't wait for Hell Boy to come out. Looks like a tight ass movie
You know its been awhile since Cha Town's Finest has blog. But you know i've been doing big things these days. Gettin my GED and chillin with my girl. Chu Preach
Hello Hoes and Bros. Dis is Da Professa. Back for the first time and last time. Naw just playin but yeah you know bout to get a tat today on my left forearm. Holla at cho boy Chu Preach

Yo wut up playa's and females. Its been awhile since i have posted on my site cuz u know i've been doin big things in this world. Nothin has been up lately just the sameo. But I gots to do it and find some ladies to please me so Holla at cho boy Chuuch Preach
